mapper.insert: insert into iot.user (uid, userName, password, firstName, lastName, email, token, mid, createDate) values (#{uid}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{token}, #{mid}, date_format(#{createDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
mapper.update: update iot.user set userName = #{userName}, password = #{password}, firstName = #{firstName}, lastName = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, token = #{token}, mid = #{mid} where uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: select * from iot.user where userName = #{userName} and password = #{password}
select password from iot.user where userName = #{userName}
mapper.update: create table if not exists iot.user ( `uid` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `userName` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `firstName` varchar(64), `lastName` varchar(64), `email` varchar(64), `token` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `mid` varchar(64), `createDate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`uid`), UNIQUE KEY `uid` (`uid`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
